data.title: How is Axis Bank performing on Supply Chain?
data.growth_fall_summary: Axis bank performance has grown by ++11%++ this year.
data.description: Supply Chain Management encompasses the planning and management of all activities involved in sourcing and procurement, conversion, and all logistics management activities.

sub_questions.question: Does the company have policies that identify disadvantaged to be proactively targeted for diversity in organisation?
sub_questions.answer: Yes, for recruitment (R) and career advancement (CA).
